amendatorysection.catchline: General violations; penalty; second offenses; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Any person violating any of the provisions of the Uniform Credentialing Act, except as specific penalties are otherwise imposed in the act, shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor. Any person for a second violation of any of the provisions of the act, for which another specific penalty is not expressly imposed, shall be guilty of a Class II misdemeanor.

annotation.para: Each treatment on different days constitutes a separate offense. Harvey v. State, 96 Neb. 786, 148 N.W. 924 (1914).
